definition.text:
1. One who administers comfort or consolation; one who strengthens and supports the mind in distress or danger.I looked for comforters, but found none. Psalms 6 9:20.Miserable comforters are ye all. Job 1 6:2.
2. The title of the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name--he shall teach you all things. John 1 4:1
6.
